Title: How to Go From Team Member to CEO
Description:
Today we’ll hear about: 

  • A son looking for advice on how to stay humble while taking over his dad’s business  
  • A business owner wondering if he needs to have a replacement ready before firing someone  
  • A veterinarian unsure if she needs to offer a sign-on bonus to compete with corporate America  
  • An entrepreneur who wants to prevent team members from stealing her clients
